column4: when i get the ubuntu-restricted-extras, some of the .deb files contain scripts to 'wget' certain tarballs, and some .EXE packages containing MS truetype fonts. where are those stored prior to installation?
tried there, no dice, the files are gone. i was hoping to save them for a rainy day, in case i have problems connecting to the net or something while reinstalling.
do agree with you about 60Hz, but most monitors come in that flavour.
